description: Students will design, conduct, and report on an empirical question in social psychology. The research may involve experiments, content analysis, cross-cultural comparison, interviewing, observations, or other methods. Class discussions will help students formulate their projects and provide an opportunity for reports.
name: RESEARCH EXP SOCIAL PSYC: SEXUALITY & ATTRACTION
